programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Aryann and Tristan help to clear Waldo's name after Gomez drags his name into a scandal. Jenna forms another devious plot as she digs deeper into Waldo and Aryann's past.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: A heated confrontation erupts after Tristan learns about Waldo and Aryann's past. With Aryann's life crumbling before her, Jenna is a step closer to taking back her family.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Aryann and Waldo tie up loose ends as they decide to let go of their failed love. However, fate finds a way to bring them together again when Aryann's former client goes berserk.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Bent on keeping Aryann for himself, Tristan resorts to desperate measures to marry her. Armand, under Jenna's orders, works on eliminating Aryann and Waldo's family.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: While Aryann remains unconscious at the hospital, Waldo decides to cut their ties for good. Tristan finds himself in hot water as he gets blamed for the attempt on Waldo's life.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Aryann is thrown into a vortex of emotions when she learns that she is pregnant with Tristan's child. Unaware of Jenna's plans, Tristan resolves to rebuild his relationship with Aryann.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: As Waldo struggles to find a new job, he meets a lady who he butts heads with. Aryann and Tristan move in together upon learning of their son's condition, while Jenna seeks revenge.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Waldo's hard work pays off when he receives a job offer. Tristan, Aryann, and Rosing fly to the U.S. where their worst fears about the unborn child is confirmed.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Jenna pounces on Tristan's misfortunes. Chesca's safety is put in danger after agreeing to meet with Zach.

programme.title: All Souls Night
programme.desc: Shirley is a caregiver and finds herself working for a strange family living in fear of her father.

programme.title: Maybe This Time
programme.desc: Years after a bitter separation, two long-lost sweethearts reunite and confront the pains of the past to give love a second chance.

programme.title: Till I Met You
programme.desc: Ali quits the Philippine Military Academy, disobeying his father's wishes. Cast out from his home, Ali turns to Iris for help. Ali and Iris's friendship develops into something more as Iris helps Ali pursue his dreams.

programme.title: Till I Met You
programme.desc: Coming up with a plan for their future, Ali and Iris head to Greece for their internship. Meanwhile, Cassandra and Agnes are horrified to hear Iris mention a familiar name from their past.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Franco informs Tiago that Rhian chose to save Ethan during their encounter. This, in turn, causes Tiago to assume that Rhian has feelings for Ethan. He then orders Franco to continue keeping a close watch on his daughter.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Refusing to let Corazon go to Tiago's house alone, Marcial accompanies her to Santi's birthday party. The trip proves fruitful for Marcial as he discovers an undisclosed information about his nemesis. Meanwhile, Rhian finds out Tiago's cruel plan against the people of Sto. Francisco.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Fearing for their respective daughters' lives, Romina and Daniela both find it hard to keep calm. Robert takes matters into his own hands and carefully makes use of his resources to satisfy the kidnappers' demands. Kulas, on the other hand, disregards the possible consequences of his actions and takes one step ahead. Meanwhile, Marga attempts to get past her abductors in desperation to escape. However, this only puts her and Cassie in even more danger.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Kulas' careless act pisses off the kidnappers and drives them to demand more money from the Mondragons. With double the amount to gather and less time to deliver, Robert struggles to keep his composure. Cassie, on the other hand, remains brave in the face of danger. Using her wits, she creates an opportunity to outsmart and escape her abductors. However, instead of finding a way out, she receives a revelation that shakes her to the core.

programme.title: Ikaw Lang Ang Iibigin
programme.desc: Gabriel asks Rigor about his mother, but doubts his father’s honesty. Later, Carlos invites him for a drink. Isabel is hopeful about rekindling her friendship with Carlos, but faces constant disagreement with her mother. Meanwhile, Roman discovers that Maila is investigating Rigor as well.

programme.title: Ikaw Lang Ang Iibigin
programme.desc: Carlos comforts Isabel, unknowingly giving her false hope of a reconciliation. Her joy fades when she hears Sandra arguing with Josh. Later, Carlos meets Gabriel for a drink and informs him about Rigor’s attempts to contact Victoria. Meanwhile, Maila gets a call from an unexpected source.

programme.title: Maybe This Time
programme.desc: Years after a bitter separation, two long-lost sweethearts reunite and confront the pains of the past to give love a second chance.

programme.desc: Through the years, Robert has developed a great working relationship with his secretary, Romina. This does not sit well with Robert’s daughter, Daniela, who doubts the assistant’s true intentions. Things take a turn for the worse when Daniela discovers that her old flame is Romina’s current boyfriend.
